answers.answer: Well my doc wouldnt let me eat anything after midnight or drink and they came back normal after my three hour glucose screening good luck!!! I see where others could eat but mii doc wouldnt let me after midnight she said it would mess with the test!! Hope all is well and i helped!
Same thing happened to me. Make sure you don't eat after 9 pm & drink lots of water throughout the day, very to avoid any sugary things & carbs. Good luck

I Dont think you should try to manipulate the test results. Just eat regular as this will be an indication about whether or not you can develop pregnancy diabetes. If so, they can take precautions. If you do manage to manipulate it and something happens that could have been prevented or anticipated on, you are going to feel sorry, so dont try to influence your results :) It's healthier and safer for the doctor to have a realistisch indicatoren

Thank you all so muchShe said fasting but not certain times or anything so this helps a lot.I'm not manipulating I just wanted to be aware of everything to know what I'm doing wrong and quit it immediately.Thank u so much

I had gd my first pregnancy an dr told me to go ahead an start watching what I eat an following a gd diet early this pregnancy. I failed my one hour witch they did early so I really focused on diet an When I did my 3 hour I passed I still follow the diet an have had no problems. If I were you I would look up gd diet an maybe speak to a nutritionist. Also I know the first time I had it I followed a strict diet an only needed insulin the last two weeks. I was induced at 39 weeks an he only weighed 7. 7 ounces
Ur gonna want to ask ur Dr what their protocol is .. my Dr had me carb load for 3 days then fast for 12 hrs n take my 3 hr test to see how my body responds to sugars
Thank u I'll find out more next week when I goHow long does it take to get the results?
Don't eat anything if its high they need to no so they can put you on a diet so or baby don't grow to fast its to test for pregnancy diabetes

Mine took like 3 days .. and I have gestational diabetes .. I didn't carb load w my first and I borderline passed the test when I shouldn't have my son came out w extremely low blood sugar and had to be monitored.. so yes Def talk to ur Dr some say no some say yes I wish now I woulda paid attention to what his protocol was. My first is  healthy as could be now thank God! Just a ruff first few days getting his sugars up

question: I had an appointment last month to first tell me I was expecting they did blood work and I received a call today my sugar came back slightly high they want me to return next week to do a three hr glucose test for better readings.What are tips to avoid high numbers?Eat hardly anything day before?Or what?I remember a while back someone asked and people had a lot of helpful answers I'm looking for the same please and thnx in advance
title: recieved a call from drs...im worried
